Grand Magister Winonin: Death Goddess opened her eyes, Monsters Elder build evil plans to conquer Aden. Valiant Vanguard Aden found near the Forbidden Gate in the dungeon lair of evil creatures and tried to destroy it. Braves were missing, and we were going to send a scouting party them to help. If you will do us assistance in this difficult campaign, then I will help you to discover a new strength. I'll be waiting for you at the Temple of Einhasad Aden Do not forget that this problem will determine your fate. (After reaching level 76 is available the third profession.)
